log1: ^[Raine] Who are you? You can see me?
^[Raine] I’m Raine! I’m seven years olddd!!
^[Addison] Oh, I’m Addison. Nice to meet you. Why are you here?
^[Raine] I’m waiting for mama to pick me up to go back home. Who’s that?
^[Mom] Hi dearie! I’m Addison’s mom. Where’s your mom?
^[Raine] I just know one day I was having a tea party here, but my friend— Mr. Teetee— he almost fell off the roof, so I tried to catch him.
^[Raine] I don’t remember what happened, but I found myself floating around and glowing!
^[Raine] After I got used to floating around, I tried to look for mama, but I couldn't find her.
^[Raine] Then, I remembered that she said to always stay where I am so she can find me!
^[Mom] I don’t think I have, darling.
^[Raine] Oh... That’s okay. Thanks anyway! I’ll keep waiting for her!
log2: ^[Raine] How come your mama is floating and glowing like me?
^[Addison] Hm… I think you must have drank tea with magical abilities. Maybe your mama will drink the same tea as you and float and glow like you.
^[Raine] Really? I want that! I hope she’ll drink the magical tea so I can see her clearly! It’s hard to find her when she’s not floaty and glowy.
log3: ^[Raine] Mr. Teetee, don’t drink so much tea! You’ll have to pee again!!
